title: Meta unveils cheaper $299 Quest 3S VR headset
content: Meta announced the Quest 3S, the latest virtual-reality headset to come out of the company's Reality Labs division and a cheaper offering than its predecessor.
summary: Meta announced the Quest 3S, the latest virtual-reality headset to come out of the company's Reality Labs division and a cheaper offering than its predecessor.

title: Surging AI demand could cause the world's next chip shortage, research says
content: A surge in demand for AI semiconductors and AI-enabled smartphones and laptops could lead to the next global chip shortage, according to Bain & Company.
summary: A surge in demand for AI semiconductors and AI-enabled smartphones and laptops could lead to the next global chip shortage, according to Bain & Company.

title: Etihad reveals $7 billion investment plan over five years, will retrofit old Boeing jets
content: Etihad's Group Chief Executive Officer Antonoaldo Neves revealed passengers should expect "a totally different airline" within the next two to three years.
summary: Etihad's Group Chief Executive Officer Antonoaldo Neves revealed passengers should expect "a totally different airline" within the next two to three years.

title: Google files EU antitrust complaint accusing Microsoft of stifling cloud competition
content: Google said in an antitrust complaint that Microsoft uses unfair licensing contracts in its Azure cloud computing business to stifle competition.
summary: Google said in an antitrust complaint that Microsoft uses unfair licensing contracts in its Azure cloud computing business to stifle competition.

title: Bettina Orlopp: The woman tasked with leading Commerzbank amid UniCredit takeover battle
content: Commerzbank on Tuesday announced its current Chief Financial Officer Bettina Orlopp will soon become CEO of the embattled German bank.
summary: Commerzbank on Tuesday announced its current Chief Financial Officer Bettina Orlopp will soon become CEO of the embattled German bank.

title: Mortgage refinance boom takes hold, as weekly demand surges 20%
content: Applications to refinance a home loan surged 20% last week compared with the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.
summary: Applications to refinance a home loan surged 20% last week compared with the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.

title: Caught cold by UniCredit’s swoop on Commerzbank, Germany will want to avoid a national embarrassment
content: Italy's UniCredit appears to have caught German authorities off guard with a potential multibillion euro merger of Frankfurt-based Commerzbank.
summary: Italy's UniCredit appears to have caught German authorities off guard with a potential multibillion euro merger of Frankfurt-based Commerzbank.

title: The unspoken rules of celebrating Oktoberfest in Munich
content: How to order a beer? Which side to tie a dirndl? Here's what to know about celebrating Octoberfest in Munich, the birthplace of the world-famous annual event.

title: China likely needs more than rate cuts to boost economic growth
content: More fiscal support is needed, analysts said, after the PBOC surprised markets by announcing plans to cut a number of rates.

title: Southwest Airlines to cut service and staffing in Atlanta to slash costs
content: The changes come a day before Southwest's investor day, when executives will map out the company's plan to cut costs and grow revenue.

title: Chinese yuan hits strongest level against dollar in over 16 months as investors assess PBOC stimulus
content: China's yuan briefly rose to its strongest level in over a year after Beijing unveiled a slate of stimulus measures to shore up the slowing economy.
summary: China's yuan briefly rose to its strongest level in over a year after Beijing unveiled a slate of stimulus measures to shore up the slowing economy.

title: Japan's largest rice shortage in years is exacerbated by sushi-hungry tourists, weather
content: Japanese rice is a key staple in many of its iconic dishes, but the country is facing its biggest shortfall in years.

title: 'Stop ripping us off': Senate grills Novo Nordisk CEO on weight loss drug pricing
content: Sen. Bernie Sanders argues that Novo Nordisk charges Americans substantially higher prices for its drugs than it does for patients in other countries.
summary: Sen. Bernie Sanders argues that Novo Nordisk charges Americans substantially higher prices for its drugs than it does for patients in other countries.

title: Meet the ex-Goldman wealth advisor who quit to solve Britain’s £567 billion gender investment gap
content: Ayesha Ofori launched Propelle, a female-focused financial investment platform, after realizing she had spent her career making "rich men richer."

title: OPEC is highly bullish on long-term oil demand growth. Not everyone agrees
content: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries, OPEC, published its World Oil Outlook for 2024, with optimistic forecasts for robust oil demand growth.

title: U.S. Steel CEO defends planned sale to Japan's Nippon, believes deal will close on its merits

title: FTX fraudster Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in prison, ordered to forfeit $11 billion

title: Cathay Pacific bans couple after video showed inflight dispute over reclined seat

title: Fed's jumbo interest rate cut puts the U.S. on track for a soft landing, Goldman CFO says

title: Blackstone and Vista Equity Partners to acquire software maker Smartsheet for $8.4 billion
